Title: Ben Roethlisberger meets with Steelers president Art Rooney II and it reportedly went well
Description: Ben Roethlisberger and Steelers president Art Rooney II met with each other on Tuesday, according to Gerry Dulac of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette. The meeting reportedly "went well," as Roethlisberger and Rooney undoubtedly discussed the quarterback's future with the organization.
Author: CBSSports.com
